alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:40PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF VALENCIA, SOUTHEASTERN SANDOVAL, NORTH CENTRAL SOCORRO, BERNALILLO AND WEST CENTRAL TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM MDT... At 639 PM MDT, radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Albuquerque, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated and ground observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, Rio Rancho, Valencia, Los Lunas, Corrales, Bernalillo, Belen, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, Bosque Farms and Peralta. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 137 and 178. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 179 and 248. Highway 550 between Mile Markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Blowing dust associated with strong thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.

area.areaDesc: Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands
